headline: Corteva: Get Your Piece Of SpinCo As A Stable Portfolio Compounder
summary: Corteva (CTVA) split creates seed pure-play SpinCo with 26% margins and discounted 9.3x EV/EBITDA; upside via buybacks/dividends. See more here.
